body_text: Why is Sailor Moon (2014) not airing on TV? The new Sailor Moon seems to be showing on Niconico exclusively. Why would it not air on TV, or both?

Why does Sailor Moon Crystal not air weekly? Sailor Moon Crystal is "airing" (online) every 1st and 3rd Friday of the month. Not only is this not every week, but not every other week.
Why is this?
